Meta description: Pulse displays the following metrics to provide insights into the current and historic performance of your software delivery process:
Use the Pulse CLI to send information about changes, deployments, and incidents whenever they happen in the software delivery workflow of your primary application or service.
This page includes examples of scripts that we used to quickly populate our own Pulse dashboard with historical data.
Pulse calculates the four key Accelerate metrics using strictly changes, deployments, and incidents data for a rolling window of the last 90 days:
Lead time for changes and review metrics provide an extra level of detail about the performance of your team workflows.
Pulse calculates the work in progress metrics based on the status of all pull requests targeting any base branch in your GitHub repositories.
Pulse integrates directly with GitHub to receive data about changes and deployments, necessary to calculate the metrics:
Pulse integrates directly with PagerDuty to receive data about incidents, necessary to calculate the metrics Median time to recover and Change failure rate.
